Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.cli.controller

Class ClientState

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.cli.controller.ClientState
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutomatedState, GameState, LobbyState, SetupState
public abstract class ClientState extends Object
Abstract class representing the state of a client in the application.
